description: building overturning simulation with pressure distribution and moment analysis

units.description: SI units with length in meters for pressure analysis, millimeters for motion simulation

force_history.description: Force and moment history output configuration - saves time, external forces, uplift force from pressure, moments, position, and velocity. Used for overturning analysis.

pressure_grid_export.description: Pressure grid distribution export configuration - saves entire pressure grid with coordinates and wet/dry status at specified intervals

solver.description: Iterative solver settings for Poisson equation. Defaults: max_iterations=1000, tolerance=1e-6. Typical convergence: 10-100 iterations for grid sizes 5x5 to 50x50. Increase max_iterations if convergence warnings appear. Decrease tolerance to 1e-4 for faster solving with slight accuracy loss.
